#### Basic Radar Charts

```{r}
library(plotly)

p <- plot_ly(
    type = 'scatterpolar',
    r = c(39, 28, 8, 7, 28, 39),
    theta = c('A','B','C', 'D', 'E', 'A'),
    fill = 'toself'
  ) %>%
  layout(
    polar = list(
      radialaxis = list(
        visible = T,
        range = c(0,50)
      )
    ),
    showlegend = F
  )

p
```

#### Multiple Trace Radar Charts

```{r}
library(plotly)

p <- plot_ly(
    type = 'scatterpolar',
    fill = 'toself'
  ) %>%
  add_trace(
    r = c(39, 28, 8, 7, 28, 39),
    theta = c('A','B','C', 'D', 'E', 'A'),
    name = 'Group A'
  ) %>%
  add_trace(
    r = c(1.5, 10, 39, 31, 15, 1.5),
    theta = c('A','B','C', 'D', 'E', 'A'),
    name = 'Group B'
  ) %>%
  layout(
    polar = list(
      radialaxis = list(
        visible = T,
        range = c(0,50)
      )
    )
  )

p
```
